full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA CHOS KYI PHUNG PO ZHES BYA BA THEG PA CHEN PO'I MDO BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @020B BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYI DE SKAD CES BKA' STZAL NAS, TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BU DANG, LHA DANG, MI DANG, LHA MA YIN DU BCAS PA'I @021A *, ,'JIG RTEN YI RANGS TE, BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS GSUNGS PA LA MNGON PAR BSTOD DO,, ,,'PHAGS PA CHOS KYI PHUNG PO ZHES BYA BA THEG PA CHEN PO'I MDO RDZOGS SO,, ,,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO PRADZNY'A BAR MA DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LOTZTSA BA BAN DE YE SHES SDES BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA, ,
